Text:
Thanks.

It's not Zydego, it's Zydeco.

Besides being the artist's stage name, it's also a genre.
Unfortunately, TPB doesn't allow editing, so you can't correct the name. This torrent will be skipped when searching for Zydeco.

WTF?!

I didn't realize till after I'd downloaded it, that this is ONLY ONE TRACK!

For anyone curious, here's an Amazon link to this album: http://www.amazon.com/Zydeco-Putumayo-Presents/dp/B00003OP0X
